title: Application of Claims-Based Frailty Index to a Structured Electronic Health Record Data
details: MJ Kwak, C Schaefer, Y Kim, S Fu, CM Park, A Dhoble… - The Journals of Gerontology …, 2025
abstract: Abstract Background The Claims-based Frailty Index (CFI) has been developed and validated using Medicare claims data. However, whether CFI can be applied to structured EHR data has not been studied. Methods We applied the CFI to a …
